statements: SELECT * FROM book_reviews;
SELECT review_id, book_id, rating FROM book_reviews;
SELECT user_id, review_text FROM book_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT book_id, review_text FROM book_reviews ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM book_reviews WHERE review_id = 3;
SELECT review_id, book_id, user_id, review_text, rating FROM book_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT review_id, user_id, review_text FROM book_reviews WHERE book_id = 101 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT book_id, COUNT(review_id) AS num_reviews FROM book_reviews GROUP BY book_id HAVING num_reviews > 5;
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM book_reviews GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT book_id, user_id, rating FROM book_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY rating DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM book_reviews;
SELECT book_title, rating FROM book_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, review_text FROM book_reviews ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT book_title, review_text, rating FROM book_reviews WHERE book_title='Dune';
SELECT book_title, user_id FROM book_reviews JOIN user_ratings ON book_reviews.review_id = user_ratings.book_id;
SELECT * FROM book_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT book_title, user_id FROM book_reviews WHERE book_title = 'The Great Gatsby';
SELECT review_id, book_title, rating FROM book_reviews WHERE user_id = '1234';
SELECT book_title, review_text FROM book_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS max_rating, MIN(rating) AS min_rating FROM book_reviews;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE published_year > 2000;
SELECT book_id, title FROM books ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT reviews.book_id, books.title, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM reviews JOIN books ON reviews.book_id = books.book_id GROUP BY reviews.book_id;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE published_year > 2000;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE author LIKE '%Rowling%';
SELECT * FROM books WHERE published_year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000 ORDER BY published_year DESC;
SELECT b.title, r.rating, u.name FROM books b JOIN reviews r ON b.book_id = r.book_id JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM books ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT * FROM book;
SELECT id, title, author FROM book WHERE publication_year = 2020;
SELECT title, author, publication_year FROM book ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM user WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT username, email FROM user WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM book ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM book WHERE publication_year > 2000 AND author LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT user.username, review.rating, review.comment FROM review INNER JOIN user ON review.user_id = user.id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT book.title, user.username FROM book INNER JOIN rating ON book.id = rating.book_id INNER JOIN user ON rating.user_id = user.id WHERE rating > 5 ORDER BY book.title ASC;
SELECT * FROM book WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE year_published > 2000;
SELECT title, author, year_published FROM books ORDER BY year_published DESC;
SELECT b.title, b.author, r.rating, r.review_text FROM books b JOIN reviews r ON b.book_id = r.book_id;
SELECT u.username, g.genre_name FROM users u, genres g JOIN book_genres bg ON g.genre_id = bg.genre_id WHERE bg.book_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE year_published > 2000;
SELECT books.title, reviews.rating, users.username FROM books JOIN reviews ON books.book_id = reviews.book_id JOIN users ON reviews.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT books.title, books.year_published, genres.genre_name FROM books JOIN book_genres ON books.book_id = book_genres.book_id JOIN genres ON book_genres.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT reviews.rating, reviews.review_text, users.username FROM reviews JOIN users ON reviews.user_id = users.user_id WHERE reviews.rating >= 4;
